title: A commentary upon the Acts of the Apostles, chronicall and criticall the difficulties of the text explained, and the times of the story cast into annals : the first part, from the beginning of the Booke, to the end of the twelfth chapter : with a briefe survey of the contemporary story of the Jews and Romans / by John Lightfoot ...
author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R.C. for Andrew Crooke ...,
